name: Aztec: Day with Cat
description:
Cat's activation:

I’ll be running Pick a Topic presentations -
(a) What is Aztec & how does it work
(b) The anatomy of a transaction
(c) Code a private voting contract with Aztec.nr from scratch
(d) The return of ZK money (not really) (but the code exists)
(e) Aztec’s circuits
They will run anywhere from 3 to 20 minutes depending on the topic, and will go over high level concepts as well as coding workshops. People can also play with a local version of private uniswap transactions for that ZK money nostalgia feel.
